price: Ɛberε a ͻka kyerεε n'agya ne ne nkorͻfoͻ sε: “Ɛdeεn ne saa ahonin a mode mo ho ama resom wͻn yi?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
